original_text: This man was seized by the Jews and they were about to kill him, but I came with my troops and rescued him, for I had learned that he is a Roman citizen.
korean_text: 이 사람이 유대인들에게 잡혀 죽게 된 것을 내가 로마 사람인 줄 들어 알고 군대를 거느리고 가서 구원하여다가

sentences.original_text: This man was seized by the Jews
and they were about to kill him
but I came with my troops
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 나의 군대와 함께 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: that he is a Roman citizen
